findMBeanServer

void findMBeanServer(java.lang.Object address)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                            AgentNotFoundException
Tries to locate the MBeanServer using different methods. If the address is a reference, it looks for the MBeanServer locally and then remotely. If the address is a string, it is considerend an URL and tries to connect to the remote ConnectorServer.

Parameters:
address -
Throws:
AgentNotFoundException
java.rmi.RemoteException

                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
